definition: relative superiority (better or worse, stronger or weaker, above or below etc)
high/tall/above average/loud/your (honorific)
surname Gao
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to compete against/to measure oneself against/to go head to head (see who is best)
equally matched/not much to distinguish who is stronger

sentences.english: The candidates are running neck and neck in this election.
sentences.chinese: 这场选举中候选人难分高下。

sentences.english: Iron young tiger excited, but finally to compete with small, turn.
sentences.chinese: 铁彪激动，但终于对小高下不了手，转身而去。

sentences.english: Comparing something head-to-head with a pre-determined standard to ascertain success or failure.
sentences.chinese: 将某件事与原告制定的标准逐一对比，论成败高下。

sentences.english: They decided to settle the argument with a race. They agreed on a route and started off the race.
sentences.chinese: 它们决定来一场比赛分高下，选定了路线，就此起跑。

sentences.english: I bet you could give him a run for his money.
sentences.chinese: 我认为你可以跟他一比高下。

sentences.english: Past civilizations were measured by how they treated their elderly and disabled.
sentences.chinese: 古代文明的高下以人们如何尊老助残为衡量标准。

sentences.english: Its new government is grappling with a deficit that rivals Spain's.
sentences.chinese: 英国新政府面临着与西班牙“难分高下”的赤字困境。

sentences.english: Most of the central province is forested undulating plateau.
sentences.chinese: 省中部的尽大局部是被森林笼罩的高下讫伏的高本。

sentences.english: The GOP might win a showdown if it came to that in the current Congress.
sentences.chinese: 共和党可能赢得一决高下的话那在本届国会的。

sentences.english: He rivals his brother in his skill as a pianist.
sentences.chinese: 他和他的兄弟在弹钢琴的技巧上难分高下。

sentences.english: The game was closer than the score suggests.
sentences.chinese: 实际的比赛与所得的分数相比难分高下。

sentences.english: The understanding that the mobility of culture and individuals perse bears no hierarchal set of value judgments is proposed and reiterated.
sentences.chinese: 文化或人的移动方向本身也不包含价值高下的区别。

definition: height/altitude (aviation)/pitch (music)/ups and downs (success or failure)/whether sth is right or wrong/comparative strength, weight, depth, stature/(spoken interjection) anyway, whatever/eventually, in the end
good and bad/merits and drawbacks
not to know one's place
victory or defeat/the outcome of a battle
length/duration/accident/right and wrong/good and bad/long and short
lit. unable to distinguish eldest brother from second brother (idiom); they are all equally excellent/nothing to choose between them
lit. you die, I live (idiom); irreconcilable adversaries/two parties cannot coexist
victory or defeat/result
to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)
strong or weak/intensity/amount of force or pressure
a tie-break/to determine the winner
well-matched/equally matched
the result (becomes apparent)/now one understands
the result becomes apparent/(after) the dust has settled
equally matched/about the same
to compete fiercely/contest
